alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:11PM AKDT until July 07 at 7:45PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands in Alaska... * Until 745 PM AKDT. * At 711 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 28 miles northeast of Twelvemile Summit, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
